cosmosportals.gui.config.name: Cosmos Portals Config
cosmosportals.gui.config.size_info: Allows you to change the maximum size of Portals
cosmosportals.gui.config.size_info_two: WARNING: Larger portals WILL create lag
cosmosportals.gui.config.size_info_three: Limited to the range of between 2 and 9
cosmosportals.gui.config.sound.travel_in: Whether this mod will play Portal Travel Sounds
cosmosportals.gui.config.sound.ambient_i: Whether this mod will play Ambient Portal Sounds
cosmosportals.gui.config.message.info_de: Whether this mod will print [INFO] messages to the console/log
cosmosportals.gui.config.message.debug_d: Whether this mod will print [DEBUG] messages to the console/log
cosmosportals.gui.config.frame_textures_: Whether or not Portal Frames use Connected Textures
cosmosportals.gui.config.portal_textures: Whether or not Portals use Connected Textures
cosmosportals.gui.config.labels_info: Whether or not Portal Labels are rendered
cosmosportals.gui.config.particles_info: Whether or not Portal Particle Effects are rendered
cosmosportals.gui.config.label_distance_: How far away Portal Labels will still render
cosmosportals.gui.config.message.restart: A restart is required for this option to take effect
cosmosportals.gui.dock.label_info: Show or Hide Portal Dimension Labels.
cosmosportals.ui.help.container_one: This is an indicator of if this Portal
cosmosportals.ui.help.container_item_one: This shows the actual Dimension Container
cosmosportals.ui.help.container_item_two: that is stored inside this Dock.
cosmosportals.ui.help.button_entity_one: This Button cycles through the Entity Filter,
cosmosportals.ui.help.button_entity_two: which allows you to choose what Entities
cosmosportals.ui.help.button_entity_thre: are able to use this Portal.
cosmosportals.ui.help.button_settings_on: This Button opens and closes the Portal
cosmosportals.ui.help.label: Portal Label
cosmosportals.ui.help.label_one: This is a visual representation of what
cosmosportals.ui.help.label_two: Dimension this Portal is linked to,
cosmosportals.ui.help.label_three: or a custom name you choose.
cosmosportals.ui.help.name: Portal Label Name
cosmosportals.ui.help.name_one: Enter a custom name in this Text Box
cosmosportals.ui.help.name_two: and that name will be displayed instead
cosmosportals.ui.help.clear_one: Press this button to clear the
cosmosportals.ui.help.apply_one: Press this button to set the name
cosmosportals.ui.help.apply_two: to what is in the Text Box, or
cosmosportals.ui.help.colour_one: Press this button to cycle the Portal

cosmosportals.item_info.container: An item that stores a Positon and Dimension to be used in a Portal.
cosmosportals.item_info.container_one: This item will store your Position and the Dimension you are in when used.
cosmosportals.item_info.container_linked: A Dimension Container that has been used, and is storing information.
To use: Sneak-right-click on a Portal Dock.
To clear: Craft this item by itself.
This container is linked but has no information!
cosmosportals.item_warning.container_sto: This container already has a Recorded Dimension! Shift-right-click to overwrite.
cosmosportals.item_info.guide: A full guide on Cosmos Portals!
cosmosportals.item_info.guide_one: Contains crafting recipes, mechanics and more.
cosmosportals.item_info.guide_two: To access the Guide, simply right click your Guide.
cosmosportals.block_info.dock_one: Portal Controller. Used to summon a Portal.
cosmosportals.block_info.dock_two: To use: Sneak-right-click with a Linked Dimension Container.
cosmosportals.block_info.dock_three: Has a GUI, can be configured.
cosmosportals.block_info.workbench_two: To use: Right-click to to open the UI.
cosmosportals.block_info.workbench_limit: You must provide unlinked Dimension Containers.
cosmosportals.guide.heading: Cosmic Guide
cosmosportals.guide.one_body_two:
This Guide will enable you to
better understand how to use
the mod, with all the recipes
you need to get started!
cosmosportals.guide.two_body_one:
So, you've decided you want
to explore the world of
Portals?

Well, you have come to the
right place!
cosmosportals.guide.two_body_two: In this guide, you will learn:
cosmosportals.guide.two_body_three:
To continue please use either
the tabs on the right side,
or the arrows at the bottom.
cosmosportals.guide.three_body_one:
This is a Portal Dock.
It is the heart of the Mod.
To use it: Shift-right click
with a linked Dimension Container
Thats it! It really is that simple.
This will create a
Portal to the linked Dimension
cosmosportals.guide.three_body_one_:
Portal Docks are highly
configurable.
You can choose to display
a label to show which
Dimension the Portal
links to, show particle
effects and much more!
